name: Miniature TD - VR
description: Are you ready to play a adorable tower defense game set in an voxel world? Use the VR controllers to drag and drop towers on a floating map. Defend your base from cute monsters like mini magicians, chefs, and dinosaurs.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: intel i5 4590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970, Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Required Additional Notes: Windows Media Player Required
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
